eligibility:
Post Graduates of M.Tech VLSI and Embedded Systems will be able to:
PEO1: Domain Knowledge
Apply the knowledge of VLSI and Embedded Systems to analyse, design and develop solutions for real time engineering problems
PEO2: Research Pursue higher studies and research in allied areas of VLSI and Embedded Systems
PEO3: Life Long learning Exhibit professional excellence through life long learning
At the end of the program, the graduates will be able to:
PSO1: Design solutions to real time engineering problems in industry in the domain of VLSI design and Embedded systems.
PSO2: Use modern tools and devices to solve problems related to embedded systems
PO1: Domain Knowledge Apply theoretical concepts to identify real time engineering problems existing in the domain of VLSI and Embedded Systems.
PO2: Analytical Skills Analyse and formulate solutions to the identified problems in VLSI and Embedded Systems
PO3: Solution Design Design optimum solutions through research for real time engineering problems in VLSI and Embedded Systems
PO4: Communication Communicate with the engineering community and society at large and write effective reports/design documentation by adhering to appropriate standards.
PO5: Ethics Apply ethical principles and commit to professional ethics and responsibilities and norms of the engineering practice
why_choose: Why choose this course? Industry Driven Curriculum Exposure to state-of-the-art facility Fast Track Internship Corporate Linkage Skill Enhancement Program Open air theatre and gazebos for outdoor learning
what_learn: What you will learn? Domain specific and elective courses that covers VLSI, Embedded systems, Device Modelling, Communication systems, Signal processing Open elective courses to introduce other engineering specialization Projects and internship to accomplish solutions for real world complex problem and understand the operations of Industries. Holistic education to provide overall development of the students.
